meanings.definition: The quality or state of being transitive.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the transitivenesses of verbs helps in forming complete sentences.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained the transitivenesses of different verbs to the students.
meanings.sent3: The transitivenesses of the verbs decided whether the sentence made sense or not.
meanings.sent4: Her grasp of the transitivenesses of language was like a key unlocking complex sentences.
meanings.sent5: The transitivenesses of verbs can be tricky, but practice makes perfect.

meanings.definition: The property of a verb that requires a direct object to complete its meaning.
meanings.sent1: She understood the transitivenesses of verbs when she added objects to them.
meanings.sent2: In English, the transitivenesses of verbs play a crucial role in sentence structure.
meanings.sent3: The transitivenesses of verbs made the grammar lesson more interesting.
meanings.sent4: The transitivenesses of verbs acted like magnets, attracting direct objects.
meanings.sent5: Learning about the transitivenesses of verbs made writing more engaging.
